data.description: Oracle Product Release is seeking a Summer Intern to join the Cloud Product Release Team. The intern will leverage the Oracle APEX low-code development platform and AI technologies to automate key processes such as test planning, data validation, and item/pricing setup. Responsibilities include developing AI agents, applying prompt engineering and orchestration techniques, and integrating solutions with existing frameworks, CI/CD, and enterprise data sourcesâ€”all while ensuring security and compliance requirements are met.
